title: Multiple Warning Lights at Once

likely_causes.cause: Low battery voltage or charging system issue
CAN bus communication error between modules

recommended_checks: Check battery voltage and charging system.
Scan all modules for communication codes (U-codes).
Inspect grounds and main power connections.
safety_warning: Multiple system warnings may disable safety features unexpectedly.

title: No Communication With One or More Modules
symptom_short: Scan tool cannot communicate with a control module
recommended_checks: Check fuses supplying the affected module.
Inspect grounds near the module location.
safety_warning: Loss of module communication can disable related systems.

title: Intermittent Electronic Faults
symptom_short: Random warnings or features stop working intermittently

likely_causes.cause: Water intrusion in wiring harness or module

recommended_checks: Inspect grounds and connectors for corrosion.
Check for signs of water intrusion.
Wiggle-test suspect harnesses while monitoring scan data.
safety_warning: Intermittent faults are difficult to predict and can affect safety systems.

title: Vehicle Will Not Start Due to Network Fault
symptom_short: Vehicle does not start despite good battery

likely_causes.cause: CAN bus short caused by failed module

recommended_checks: Scan for immobilizer and BCM codes.
Check for aftermarket devices tied into CAN lines.
Isolate modules if CAN short is suspected.
safety_warning: Network-related no-start conditions often require professional diagnostics.
